verses.verse: And they took their journey <S%H5265><s%> from Elim, <S%H362><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sin, <S%H5512><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is between <S%H996><s%> Elim <S%H362><s%> and Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> after their departing <S%H3318><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> murmured <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in the wilderness: <S%H4057><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, Would <S%H4310><s%> <S%H5414><s%> to God we had died <S%H4191><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> when we sat <S%H3427><s%> by the flesh <S%H1320><s%> pots, <S%H5518><s%> and when we did eat <S%H398><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full; <S%H7648><s%> for you have brought <S%H3318><s%> us forth <S%H3318><s%> into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> whole <S%H854><s%> <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> with hunger. <S%H7457><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will rain <S%H4305><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> for you; and the people <S%H5971><s%> shall go <S%H3318><s%> out and gather <S%H3950><s%> a certain <S%H1697><s%> rate <S%H1697><s%> every day, <S%H3117><s%> that I may prove <S%H5254><s%> them, whether they will walk <S%H3212><s%> in my law, <S%H8451><s%> or no. <S%H3808><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they shall prepare <S%H3559><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> they bring <S%H935><s%> in; and it shall be twice <S%H4932><s%> as much <S%H834><s%> as they gather <S%H3950><s%> daily. <S%H3117><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> At even, <S%H6153><s%> then you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has brought <S%H3318><s%> you out from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%>

And in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> then you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for that he hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> are we, that you murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> us?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This shall be, when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall give <S%H5414><s%> you in the evening <S%H6153><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> to the full; <S%H7646><s%> for that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hears <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you murmur <S%H3885><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him: and what <S%H4100><s%> are we? your murmurings <S%H8519><s%> are not against <S%H5921><s%> us, but against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for he has heard <S%H8085><s%> your murmurings. <S%H8519><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as Aaron <S%H175><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the whole <S%H3605><s%> congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they looked <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> in the cloud. <S%H6051><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the murmurings <S%H8519><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to them, saying, <S%H559><s%> At <S%H996><s%> even <S%H6153><s%> you shall eat <S%H398><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> you shall be filled <S%H7646><s%> with bread; <S%H3899><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that at even <S%H6153><s%> the quails <S%H7958><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up, and covered <S%H3680><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%> and in the morning <S%H1242><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> lay <S%H7902><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about the host. <S%H4264><s%>

And when the dew <S%H2919><s%> that lay <S%H7902><s%> was gone <S%H5927><s%> up, behold, <S%H2009><s%> on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> there lay a small <S%H1851><s%> round <S%H2636><s%> thing, as small <S%H1851><s%> as the hoar <S%H3713><s%> frost <S%H3713><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> it, they said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H251><s%> It is manna: <S%H4478><s%> for they knew <S%H3045><s%> not what <S%H4100><s%> it was. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, This <S%H1931><s%> is the bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you to eat. <S%H402><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has commanded, <S%H6680><s%> Gather <S%H3950><s%> of it every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating, <S%H400><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> for every man, <S%H1538><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of your persons; <S%H5315><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> you every man <S%H376><s%> for them which <S%H834><s%> are in his tents. <S%H168><s%>
And the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> and gathered, <S%H3950><s%> some more, <S%H7227><s%> some less. <S%H4591><s%>

And when they did mete <S%H4058><s%> it with an omer, <S%H6016><s%> he that gathered much <S%H7235><s%> had nothing <S%H3808><s%> over, <S%H5736><s%> and he that gathered little <S%H4591><s%> had no <S%H3808><s%> lack; <S%H2637><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating. <S%H400><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> leave <S%H3498><s%> of it till <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Notwithstanding they listened <S%H8085><s%> not to Moses; <S%H4872><s%> but some <S%H582><s%> of them left <S%H3498><s%> of it until <S%H5704><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and it bred <S%H7311><s%> worms, <S%H8438><s%> and stank: <S%H887><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> with them.

And they gathered <S%H3950><s%> it every morning, <S%H1242><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> according <S%H6310><s%> to his eating: <S%H400><s%> and when the sun <S%H8121><s%> waxed hot, <S%H2552><s%> it melted. <S%H4549><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> they gathered <S%H3950><s%> twice <S%H4932><s%> as much bread, <S%H3899><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> omers <S%H6016><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> man: and all <S%H3605><s%> the rulers <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to them, This <S%H1931><s%> is that which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has said, <S%H1696><s%> To morrow <S%H4279><s%> is the rest <S%H7677><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> bake <S%H644><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> you will bake <S%H644><s%> to day, and seethe <S%H1310><s%> that you will seethe; <S%H1310><s%> and that which remains <S%H5736><s%> over <S%H5736><s%> lay <S%H5117><s%> up for you to be kept <S%H4931><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

And they laid <S%H5117><s%> it up till <S%H5704><s%> the morning, <S%H1242><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> bade: <S%H6680><s%> and it did not stink, <S%H887><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> was there any worm <S%H7415><s%> therein.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Eat <S%H398><s%> that to day; <S%H3117><s%> for to day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> to day <S%H3117><s%> you shall not find <S%H4672><s%> it in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall gather <S%H3950><s%> it; but on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> which is the sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> in it there shall be none. <S%H3808><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that there went <S%H3318><s%> out some of the people <S%H5971><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> for to gather, <S%H3950><s%> and they found <S%H4672><s%> none. <S%H3808><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> How <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> refuse <S%H3985><s%> you to keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and my laws? <S%H8451><s%>

See, <S%H7200><s%> for that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> you the sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> he gives <S%H5414><s%> you on the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of two days; <S%H3117><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> you every man <S%H376><s%> in his place, <S%H8478><s%> let no <S%H408><s%> man <S%H376><s%> go <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
So the people <S%H5971><s%> rested <S%H7673><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof Manna: <S%H4478><s%> and it was like coriander <S%H1407><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> white; <S%H3836><s%> and the taste <S%H2940><s%> of it was like wafers <S%H6838><s%> made with honey. <S%H1706><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commands, <S%H6680><s%> Fill <S%H4393><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> of it to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations; <S%H1755><s%> that they may see <S%H7200><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> I have fed <S%H398><s%> you in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> when I brought <S%H3318><s%> you forth <S%H3318><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> a pot, <S%H6803><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> an omer <S%H6016><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of manna <S%H4478><s%> therein, <S%H8033><s%> and lay <S%H3240><s%> it up before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to be kept <S%H4931><s%> for your generations. <S%H1755><s%>
As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> so Aaron <S%H175><s%> laid <S%H3240><s%> it up before <S%H6440><s%> the Testimony, <S%H5715><s%> to be kept. <S%H4931><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did eat <S%H398><s%> manna <S%H4478><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to a land <S%H776><s%> inhabited; <S%H3427><s%> they did eat <S%H398><s%> manna, <S%H4478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> to the borders <S%H7097><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>
Now an omer <S%H6016><s%> is the tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah. <S%H374><s%>
